title: Rank not showing up at end game screen
body: Title explains it all champion mastery rank isnt showing up at the end of the game

replies.body: same. Happens sometimes, but not always.
The same thing happened to me, i was wondering if i was the S+ who got my team the chest
You can find out by checking it in the Champion tab. You can see highest season grade if you hover over the champion.

Hey guys,

We found a bug with the timing of processing loot and champ mastery scores at end of game; your score and items aren't lost but sometimes will not show up. We've got a fix for that we're aiming to get out off peak today that will fix the issue.

Thanks,
-Chager
Same issue after a normal game, no rank, all it displayed was loading. have screen shot of this, this happened right after the patch for the new store.
My entire group experienced this bug as well.
Same, please upvote for Riot attention!

Heyo! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working to resolve it. You should see a fix soon. ^-^
Rip hextech crafting... We loved you even though it was a short time you had on this earth before you were disabled
I would email and see because if you haven't had any more chatrestrictions or bans you should be able to get em pretty soon I would assume
Had a Sivir game earlier today. went 7/0 and im pretty sure i would have gotten an S rank had it actually loaded the results screen.

Copy pasted from another thread:
I also had a this bug happen to me. At the end of my game no score was shown and I did not receive any chests but did gain a key fragment. Beyond that everyone on my team claimed they received two chests from that game, with our Tryndamere claiming he got an S-. The other person who got at least an S- did not say who they were, or as I suspect it was me who got it but could not see it happen. Sadly, I did not take a screenshot of the post game lobby, so I tried to be as detailed as possible.
Here is the link to the game results online if that helps any: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2125913557/227205348 
PS: I was the Janna, just in case that is not shown in the match history.
Edit: I remembered another important detail. This game put me into my Bronze I Promotional Series, but I did not receive the message that usually accompanies this event. I figure that's an important thing to note.
Edit number 2: I have discovered that I only received an A for the game I mentioned above, or at least so say the client, but that does not resolve the rest of the issue pertaining to whether or not Tryndamere got at least an S- and if so why I did not get a chest. 
Edit number 3: As of 5:00 PM MST, I got the notification that I qualified for my promo series, almost half an hour after the game ended. I still have yet to have gotten the chest.

I'm experiencing the same thing.

No chests but I know i performed well. 

Both matches here:
Sivir - http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2126045753/203350150?tab=overview
Lux - http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2125978168/203350150?tab=overview

I haven't been able to see my rank after both of these matches even after waiting. I did see that I received a key fragment though.

I have a screenshot of the post-game lobby to confirm and would love to send it to Riot if they need it.

I'm receiving the same bug. Fortunately, despite not receiving the notification, I did receive a chest for my S-, I just wasn't notified (with the pop-up or the in-text message), while the rest of my team did.
